name: The Oasis (Arcane_Convolutions)
description: This is a game that I made for Godot Wild Jam #6. In this game you assume the role of someone who is lost in the desert and has found an oasis. In order to defend your water source you need to create a barricade of cacti around it. This can be done by planting cactus seeds around the periphery of the oasis. You have to defend the oasis for a set amount of time in order to win. There are multiple oases to defend and the difficulty progresses with each one. Good luck.
